name: Immortals
tagline: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

name: Airplane!
tagline: An airplane crew takes ill. Surely the only person capable of landing the plane is an ex-pilot afraid to fly. But don't call him Shirley.

name: Under Siege
tagline: A former SEAL, now cook, is the only person who can stop a gang of terrorists when they seize control of a US Navy battleship.

name: Patriot Games
tagline: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.

name: Valkyrie
tagline: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.

name: Brokeback Mountain
tagline: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.

name: Turbo
tagline: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

name: Disclosure
tagline: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

name: Monster-in-Law
tagline: The love life of Charlotte is reduced to an endless string of disastrous blind dates, until she meets the perfect man, Kevin. Unfortunately, his merciless mother will do anything to destroy their relationship.

name: Days of Thunder
tagline: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

name: The Descendants
tagline: A land baron tries to reconnect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.

name: Cheaper by the Dozen 2
tagline: Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as heads of the Baker family who, while on vacation, find themselves in competition with a rival family of eight children, headed by Eugene Levy

name: Mr. Holland's Opus
tagline: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.

name: Dracula
tagline: The vampire comes to England to seduce a visitor's fiancée and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

name: Charlotte's Web
tagline: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

name: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
tagline: When a destructive space entity is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop the intruder.

name: Bridge to Terabithia
tagline: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.

name: The Pink Panther
tagline: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.

name: Freddy vs. Jason
tagline: Freddy Krueger and Jason Voorhees return to terrorize the teenage population. Except this time, they're out to get each other, too.

name: Beowulf
tagline: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing towns, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.

name: Blade II
tagline: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

name: MASH
tagline: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

name: Eight Below
tagline: Brutal cold forces two Antarctic explorers to leave their team of sled dogs behind as they fend for their survival.

name: Unstoppable
tagline: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.

name: Payback
tagline: Porter is shot by his wife and best friend and is left to die. When he survives he plots revenge.

name: Die Hard
tagline: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

name: The Talented Mr. Ripley
tagline: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy, named Dickie Greenleaf. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

name: School of Rock

production.name: MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH & Company I. Produktions KG

tagline: A wannabe rock star in need of cash poses as a substitute teacher at a prep school, and tries to turn his class into a rock band.

name: Police Academy
tagline: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.
"21" is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

name: Snow Dogs
tagline: When a Miami dentist inherits a team of sled dogs, he's got to learn the trade or lose his pack to a crusty mountain man.

name: While You Were Sleeping
tagline: Ticket collecting romantic pretends to be engaged to an unconscious man but can't fool his brother

name: Congo
tagline: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

name: The Notebook
tagline: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.

name: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
tagline: An 8-year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.

name: Another 48 Hrs.
tagline: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond--this time, to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco bay area.

name: Moonstruck
tagline: Loretta Castorini, a book keeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she agreed to marry (the best friend of her late husband who died seven years previously).

name: Eat Pray Love
tagline: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

name: Zookeeper
tagline: A group of zoo animals decide to break their code of silence in order to help their lovable zoo keeper find love -- without opting to leave his current job for something more illustrious.

name: AVP: Alien vs. Predator
tagline: During an archaeological expedition on Bouvetøya Island in Antarctica, a team of archaeologists and other scientists find themselves caught up in a battle between the two legends. Soon, the team realize that only one species can win.

name: What Happens in Vegas
tagline: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.

name: The Dukes of Hazzard
tagline: Cousins Bo and Luke Duke, with a little help from their cousin Daisy and Uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.

name: The Wedding Singer
tagline: Robbie, the singer and Julia, the waitress are both engaged to be married but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

name: Nacho Libre
tagline: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

name: Jumper
tagline: A teenager with teleportation abilities must suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

name: Saw III
tagline: Jigsaw kidnaps a doctor to keep him alive while he watches his new apprentice put an unlucky citizen through a brutal test.

name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
tagline: After picking up a traumatized young hitchhiker, five friends find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chainsaw-wielding killer and his family of equally psychopathic killers.

name: Fried Green Tomatoes
tagline: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

name: Disturbia
tagline: A teen living under house arrest becomes convinced his neighbor is a serial killer.

name: Cloverfield
tagline: Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.

name: Jack Reacher
tagline: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

name: Dear John
tagline: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.

name: Footloose
tagline: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: The Ten Commandments
tagline: The Egyptian Prince, Moses, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

name: Knowing
tagline: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

name: Coal Miner's Daughter
tagline: Biography of Loretta Lynn, a country and western singer that came from poverty to fame.

name: War Horse
tagline: Young Albert enlists to serve in World War I after his beloved horse is sold to the cavalry. Albert's hopeful journey takes him out of England and to the front lines as the war rages on.

name: The Golden Child
tagline: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child that dark forces want to eliminate.

name: Dark Shadows
tagline: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

name: Earthquake
tagline: Various stories of various people as an earthquake of un-imagineable magnitude hits Los Angeles.

name: WarGames
tagline: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

name: Hannah Montana: The Movie
tagline: As Hannah Montana's popularity begins to take over her life, Miley Stewart, on the urging from her father takes a trip to her hometown of Crowley Corners, Tennessee to get some perspective on what matters in life the most.

name: The Day the Earth Stood Still
tagline: A remake of the 1951 classic sci-fi film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

name: Limitless
tagline: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100 percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.

name: Cape Fear
tagline: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a 14 year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

name: City of Angels
tagline: Inspired by the modern classic, Wings of Desire, City involves an angel (Cage) who is spotted by a doctor in an operating room. Franz plays Cage's buddy who somehow knows a lot about angels.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
tagline: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last cannister of the ooze that created the Turtles, which Shredder wants to create an army of new mutants.

name: The English Patient
tagline: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

name: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
tagline: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

name: Cocktail
tagline: A talented New York bartender takes a job at a bar in Jamaica and falls in love.

name: We Were Soldiers

production.name: Motion Picture Production GmbH & Co. Erste KG

tagline: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
tagline: Incompetent cop Frank Drebin has to foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

name: Tower Heist
tagline: When a group of hard working guys find out they've fallen victim to a wealthy business man's Ponzi scheme, they conspire to rob his high-rise residence.

name: Backdraft
tagline: Two Chicago firefighter brothers who don't get along have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

name: Man on Fire
tagline: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

name: The Monuments Men
tagline: An unlikely World War II platoon is tasked to rescue art masterpieces from Nazi thieves and return them to their owners.

name: Free Willy
tagline: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

name: Gangs of New York
tagline: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

name: The Adventures of Tintin
tagline: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.

name: March of the Penguins

production.name: Buena Vista International Film Production France

tagline: A look at the annual journey of Emperor penguins as they march -- single file -- to their traditional breeding ground.

name: Philadelphia
tagline: When a man with AIDS is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.

name: Parental Guidance
tagline: Artie and Diane agree to look after their three grandkids when their type-A helicopter parents need to leave town for work. Problems arise when the kids' 21st-century behavior collides with Artie and Diane's old-school methods.

name: Where the Wild Things Are
tagline: An adaptation of Maurice Sendak's classic children's story, where Max, a disobedient little boy sent to bed without his supper, creates his own world - a forest inhabited by ferocious wild creatures who crown Max as their ruler.

name: The A-Team
tagline: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

name: U-571
tagline: A German submarine is boarded by disguised American submariners trying to capture their Enigma cipher machine.

name: The Terminal
tagline: An eastern immigrant finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.

name: 27 Dresses
tagline: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.

name: The Muppet Movie
tagline: Kermit and his new found friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog-legs merchant is after Kermit.

name: Father of the Bride Part II
Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
tagline: The Rugrats travel to Paris, France, where Chuckie hopes to find a new mother and keep his father from marrying an evil business woman.

name: Knight and Day
tagline: A story of a girl who gets mixed up with a spy trying to clear his name.

name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
tagline: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

name: The Untouchables
tagline: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

name: Training Day
tagline: On his first day on the job as a narcotics officer, a rookie cop goes on a 24-hour training course with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears.

name: White Men Can't Jump
tagline: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances.

name: Cocoon
tagline: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.
